description: This file is a test specification for the AppComponent in an Angular application. It uses Angular's TestBed to configure the testing module and contains unit tests to verify component creation, the value of the 'title' property, and correct rendering of the title in the DOM.

classes.name: AppComponent
classes.description: The component under test, imported from './app.component'.

methods.name: beforeEach
methods.description: Sets up the testing environment asynchronously by configuring the testing module with AppComponent.

methods.name: it('should create the app')
methods.description: Test that verifies the AppComponent instance is created successfully.

methods.name: it(`should have the 'angular' title`)
methods.description: Test that checks the 'title' property of the AppComponent equals 'angular'.

methods.name: it('should render title')
methods.description: Test that verifies the DOM renders the correct title content.
